refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
key
The key of the item to increment.
offset
The amount by which to increment the item's value; defaults to 1.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns new item's value on success or &false; on failure. The Memcached::getResultCode will return Memcached::RES_NOTFOUND if the key does not exist.
